original_text: A deacon must be faithful to his wife and must manage his children and his household well.
korean_text: 집사들은 한 아내의 남편이 되어 자녀와 자기 집을 잘 다스리는 자일지니

sentences.original_text: A deacon must be faithful to his wife
and must manage his children well
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 자기 자녀들을 잘 다스려야 합니다

sentences.original_text: and must manage his household well
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 자기 가정을 잘 관리해야 합니다
